item.title: Two More Denosumab Biosimilars Approved in the US
item.description: The new approvals bring the number of denosumab biosimilars in the US to eight, but price reductions are not yet substantial. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Higher Epinephrine Dose Tied to Better Anaphylaxis Outcomes
item.description: An initial 0.3-mg intramuscular dose is less likely to resolve symptoms than a 0.5-mg dose. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Nailfold Changes Signal Heart Risk in Systemic Sclerosis
item.description: Avascular areas on baseline nailfold capillaroscopy are strong, independent predictors of major cardiovascular events and all-cause mortality in patie...

item.title: Shingles Vaccination Linked to Vascular Benefits
item.description: Several observational analyses suggest higher cardiovascular and dementia risks in those with and without HIV who get shingles and lower risks with va...

item.title: Creatine Supplements in CVD: Helpful Addition to Treatment?
item.description: The popular supplement has shown clear benefits through boosting energy stores, including in the heart. Medscape Medical News
